es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.metrics

Interface SystemMetric<U,I>

  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of the users
    I - type of the items
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSalesDiversityMetric, AbstractSystemMetric, AggregateDiversityMetric, AverageRecommendationMetric, EIUDC, EIUFD, EIURD, Entropy, GiniIndex, GiniSimpsonIndex, IUD

    public interface SystemMetric<U,I>
    System metric: a metric that evaluates recommendations to a community of users as a whole. Can be computed in parallel fashion via mutable reduction, i.e., Stream.collect()
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es), Pablo Castells (pablo.castells@uam.es)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Recommendation<U,I> recommendation)
      Add a recommendation to the metric.
      void combine(SystemMetric<U,I> other)
      Combines the recommendations added to other system metric to this one.
      double evaluate()
      Evaluates the metric for the recommendations added so far.
      void reset()
      Resets the metric by discarding the recommendations previously added.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(Recommendation<U,I> recommendation)
        Add a recommendation to the metric.
        Parameters:
        recommendation - recommendation to be added to the computation.

      • evaluate

        double evaluate()
        Evaluates the metric for the recommendations added so far.
        Returns:
        result of the metric for the recommendations previously added

      • combine

        void combine(SystemMetric<U,I> other)
        Combines the recommendations added to other system metric to this one.
        Parameters:
        other - other system metric, should be of the same or compatible class

      • reset

        void reset()
        Resets the metric by discarding the recommendations previously added.
